page.title: 04WEATHER AND CLIMATE
page.content: There is no Meteorological station in our area but records are kept in Skerray, one kilometer west of our block, by a retired Marines officer. Although this is outside our area it is much nearer us than the official Met Offices at Wick, Kirkwall and Stornoway.The figures given are averages for the last nine years. {Rainfall }Jan 109.6: Feb 49.3: Mar 82.6: Apr 37.4: May 56.7: June 55.6: July 46.8: Aug 47.4: Sept 106.6: Oct 109.8: Nov 131.0: Dec 110.7. {Temperatures}Jan 2.6: Feb 3.2: Mar 4.7: Apr 6.4: May 9.0: June 11.3: July 13.4:Aug 13.5: Sept 11.1:Oct 8.8: Nov 5.9: Dec 3.8. {Sunshine}Jan 25.6: Feb 74.2: Mar 87.0: Apr 134.7: May 185.1: June 144.3: July 129.3 Aug 121.9: Sept 97.3: Oct 69.5 Nov 32.0: Dec 13.9.
